content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's very close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the price. I'm looking for a rent of €1,000 per month. See if you can convince me to go lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a good apartment, Mr. Schmidt. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I would be willing to pay €600 per month, but I am willing to discuss a higher price. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €600 is a bit too low for me. I understand you're a student, but this is a prime location. I could go down to €800, but that's the lowest I can go. See if you can convince me to go lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €700 per month, which is my absolute maximum. I am willing to sign a two-year lease, and I am dependable and responsible. I will follow all the rules and regulations of the apartment complex. I hope that we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €700 is still too low for me. It's a good offer, but I'm looking for €800 per month. You're a student, so I understand your budget might be tight, but this is a great apartment in a prime location. I could go to €750, but that's my final offer. See if you can convince me to go lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay €750 per month. However, I am a reliable tenant. I will pay the rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I hope that we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your reliability and responsibility. I agree to the price of €750 Euro! Let's make this official.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €750 Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
